sqlMap.select: select sub_lecture.main_lec_code,sub_lecture.sub_lec_chapter,sub_lecture.sub_lec_subject,study_note.note_type,study_note.note_date, study_note.sub_lec_code,study_note.u_id from sub_lecture join study_note on sub_lecture.sub_lec_code=study_note.sub_lec_code where study_note.u_id=#id# order by note_date desc

select main_lec_subject from main_lecture where main_lec_code=#main_lec_code#
select a.*, (select u_name from userinfo where a.t_id=u_id)u_name from(select * from main_lecture where sub_ctg_code=#sub_ctg_code# order by main_lec_regdate desc)a
select * from main_lecture where sub_ctg_code=#sub_ctg_code# and main_lec_subject like '%'||#main_lec_subject#||'%' order by main_lec_regdate desc

select a.*,coalesce(b.subLec_count,0) as subLec_count from (select a.*, coalesce(b.lecView_count,0) as lecView_count from (select a.* from main_lecture a join register_lecture b on a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code where b.u_id=#id#) a left join (select main_lec_code, count(*) as lecView_count from STUDY_SUBLEC_PROCESS where u_id=#id# group by main_lec_code) b on a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code ) a join (select main_lec_code,count(*) as subLec_count from sub_lecture group by main_lec_code) b on a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code
select count(*) from main_lecture join register_lecture on main_lecture.main_lec_code=register_lecture.main_lec_code where register_lecture.u_id=#id#

select * from main_lecture join register_lecture on main_lecture.main_lec_code=register_lecture.main_lec_code where register_lecture.u_id=#u_id# and main_lecture.sub_ctg_code=#sub_ctg_code# order by main_lecture.main_lec_regdate desc
select count(*) from main_lecture join register_lecture on main_lecture.main_lec_code=register_lecture.main_lec_code where register_lecture.u_id=#u_id# and main_lecture.sub_ctg_code=#sub_ctg_code#

select * from main_lecture where t_id=#t_id# order by main_lec_regdate desc
